Sentence.sentence: The reasoning behind this saying is that low oil prices discourage investment in new production capacity, eventually shifting the oil supply curve backward and bringing prices back up as existing oil fields—which can be tapped at relatively low marginal cost—are depleted.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: You need to understand as a citizen and as a tax payer and as a voter what’s really behind the arguments.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The U.S. trails far behind every wealthy nation and many developing ones that have family-friendly work  policies including paid parental leave, paid sick days and breast-feeding support, according to a 2007 study.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But the  invisible group wasn't far behind the high-risk set, with more than 13% of them exhibiting depression.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Today, I’d like to talk about what happens when celebrity role models get behind healthyhabits, but at the same time promote junk food.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Nijay represents a large and growing group of Americans: first-generation college students who enter school unprepared or behind.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: In the developed world, women lag behind men in pay and political power.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Canada ranked third overall but 26th in power, behind countries such as Cuba and Burundi
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The graduation rates for blacks, Latinos, and Native Americans lag far behind the graduation rates for whites and Asians.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Behind the differences in sex, skin tones and mother tongues, there are common attitudes, expectations and ambitions which risk creating a set of clones among the business leaders of the future
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: There is considerable and justified concern that the United States is falling behind much of the rest of the developed world in these essential disciplines.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: America is lagging behind in the STEM disciplines
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: M :I left 20 pages here to copy ,here's the receipt W : I'm sorry ,sir ,but we are a little behind ,could you come back in a few minutes
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: M : sorry to have kept you waiting ,Madam , I've located your luggage, it was left behind in Paris and won't arrive until later this evening W : oh ,I can't believe this ,have it been to delivered to my hotel then ,I guess Q :what happened to the woman's luggage
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: It was left behind in the hotel.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: As a consequence, they lag behind other disciplines.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: But their results also indicated films and TV shows with women or people of color in the important jobs behind the scenes—director, producer or writer—tended to have better diversity numbers.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第二套）听力  Section B

Sentence.sentence: CucinTech was a company who were very much following the pack, doing what everyone else was doing, and getting rapidly left behind.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Even parents who can see that a trip is little more than a party or celebration may well feel guilt that their child is left behind.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: If you've ever started a sentence with, "If I were you…" or found yourself scratching your head at a colleague's agony over a decision when the answer is crystal-clear, there's a scientific reason behind it.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: The reasoning behind this saying is that low oil prices discourage investment in new production capacity, eventually shifting the oil supply curve backward and bringing prices back up as existing oil fields—which can be tapped at relatively low marginal c
Sentence.come: 2017年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: The science isn't there behind most of them.
Sentence.come: 2016年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: You need to understand as a citizen and as a tax payer and as a voter what's really behind the arguments.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些词均有"在……后面"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: after, behind, at the back of
means: after和behind用来表地点时，前者强调的是顺序的先后，而后者侧重方向和位置的前后关系。请比较：The student sat after me.那个学生坐在我后面。(我坐在他前面)。The student sat behind me.那学生坐在我背后。after与behind用于指时间时，前者强调时间的先后顺序，而后者则着重于表示"落后……"或"迟于……"的概念。试比较：Who ruled after James I?詹姆斯一世之后是谁统治的?You are forty minutes behind schedule.你比规定的时间迟了40分钟。after多用于表示因时间上的先后而造成顺序的前后场合，behind则常用于仅指位置上的前后关系。请比较：Please shut the door after you.请随手关门。Please shut the door behind you.请关上你身后的门。
at the back of ：这个前置词短语既可指具体的位置的先后，又可用于指抽象的概念。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些词均有"在后，向后"之意。
means: back ： 作为副词或形容词时，强调所修饰物的位置以及动作运动方向。
backward ： 可用于人或物，指向后的，落后的或迟钝的。
hind ： 指成对并且分前后的东西的"后面的"。
behind ： 指一物同它物相对的位置或场所。

Sentence.sentence: A taste for meat is actually behind the change: an important part of its corn is used to feed chickens, pigs, and cattle.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷2 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: An assumption behind UK insurance for driverless cars, introduced earlier this year, insists that a human "be watchful and monitoring the road" at every moment.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: As they left student life behind, many had a last drink at their cheap but friendly local bar, shook hands with longtime roommates, and moved out of small apartments into high buildings.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: By opening a novel, I can leave behind my burdens and enter into a wonderful and mysterious world where I am now a new character.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Code breaking never lags (落后) far behind code making.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷1 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: He then took the wallet to a nearby police station after leaving a note behind to let the owner know it was safe.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语北京卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: I grew anxious: what if the family had simply left the cat behind?
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语重庆卷 完形填空 A 原文

Sentence.sentence: I heard a passenger behind me shouting to the driver, but he refused to stop until we reached the next stop.
Sentence.come: 2014年高考英语全国卷2 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: In most cities the sky looks as though it has been emptied of stars, leaving behind a vacant haze that mirrors our fear of the dark.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Modern America was born on the road, behind a wheel.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语浙江卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: My previous home had a stand of woods behind it and many animals in the backyard.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语四川卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Suddenly I sensed a man standing behind me.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: The intelligence behind that knowing is us—the real us.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语福建卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: These are volcanoes so explosive that they burst open in a single big crack, leaving behind a vast hole, the caldera.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: This meant, of course, that he arrived at school early in the morning, dragging his heavy instrument case across the campus to the pitying looks of the non-musicians he had left behind.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语江苏卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Unfortunately, just as I took out my camera, a woman approached from behind, and planted herself right in front of my view.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: When they were free from work, they invited us to local events and let us know of an interesting competition to watch, together with the story behind it.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷3 语法填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: You don't see I--you see the things behind it.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语北京卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Behind the scenes, they have been taking aim at someone else: the accounting standard-setters.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But the key idea behind professionalisation, argues Mr.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The new awards are an exercise in self-promotion for those behind them, say scientists.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: He agreed to join because he “found the foresight behind the establishment of the SBoRE to be novel, unique and likely to have a lasting impact.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Our mental health doesn’t really go anywhere; like the sun behind a cloud, it can be temporarily hidden from view, but it is fully capable of being restored in an instant.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年考研翻译原文

Sentence.sentence: Biological factors behind eye contact are being investigated.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: But that very anonymity is also behind the explosion of cyber-crime that has swept across the Web.
Sentence.come: 2011年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: But the key idea behind professionalisation, argues Mr. Menand, is that "the knowledge and skills needed for a particular specialisation are transmissible but not transferable."
Sentence.come: 2011年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.come: 2015年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: That's the question behind this new research.
Sentence.come: 2009年考研真题（英语一）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: The air flowing over a bird's wings curls upwards behind the wingtips, a phenomenon known as up wash.
Sentence.come: 2010年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: The research of till Von Wachter, the economist in Columbia University, suggests that not all people graduating into a recession see their life chances dimmed: those with degrees from elite universities catch up fairly quickly to where they otherwise woul
Sentence.come: 2012年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: There's always a constant fear of falling behind everyone else on the socially perpetuated "race to the finish line," whether that be toward graduate school, medical school or a lucrative career.
Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

entry.def: If something is behind a thing or person, it is on the other side of them from you, or nearer their back rather than their front.

example.ex: I put one of the cushions behind his head...
example.tran: 我把其中的一个软垫垫在他脑后。

example.ex: They were parked behind the truck...
example.tran: 他们停在了卡车后面。

entry.def: If you are walking or travelling behind someone or something, you are following them.

example.ex: Keith wandered along behind him...
example.tran: 基思跟在他后面闲逛。

example.ex: Myra and Sam and the children were driving behind them.
example.tran: 迈拉和萨姆带着孩子们开车跟在他们的后面。

entry.def: If someone is behind a desk, counter, or bar, they are on the other side of it from where you are.
entry.tran: 在（桌子、柜台、吧台等）的后面

example.ex: The colonel was sitting behind a cheap wooden desk...
example.tran: 上校坐在一张廉价的木桌后面。

example.ex: He could just about see the little man behind the counter.
example.tran: 他勉强能看到柜台后面的小个子男人。

entry.def: When you shut a door or gate behind you, you shut it after you have gone through it.

example.ex: I walked out and closed the door behind me...
example.tran: 我走了出来，随手带上了门。

example.ex: He slammed the gate shut behind him.
example.tran: 他砰的一声带上了大门。

entry.def: The people, reason, or events behind a situation are the causes of it or are responsible for it.
entry.tran: 在（某一局势）背后（或幕后）

example.ex: It is still not clear who was behind the killing...
example.tran: 凶杀案的幕后主使尚不清楚。

example.ex: He is embarrassed about the motives behind his decision.
example.tran: 关于这项决策的背后动机，他觉得难以启齿。

entry.def: If something or someone is behind you, they support you and help you.

example.ex: He had the state's judicial power behind him.
example.tran: 他有国家司法权作后盾。

entry.def: If you refer to what is behind someone's outside appearance, you are referring to a characteristic which you cannot immediately see or is not obvious, but which you think is there.

example.ex: What lay behind his anger was really the hurt he felt at Grace's refusal...
example.tran: 他生气的表面之下是因遭格雷斯拒绝而深受伤害的心。

example.ex: Behind the smiling eyes lurks the evil that led her to murder the two babies in her care.
example.tran: 她笑里藏刀，杀害了她照顾的两个宝宝。

entry.def: If you are behind someone, you are less successful than them, or have done less or advanced less.

example.ex: She finished second behind the American, Ann Cody, in the 800 metres...
example.tran: 她在800米赛跑中落后于美国选手安·科迪而位居第二。

example.ex: Food production has already fallen behind the population growth.
example.tran: 粮食生产已经跟不上人口增长。

entry.def: If an experience is behind you, it happened in your past and will not happen again, or no longer affects you.
entry.tran: 对…来说成为过去；抛到…的脑后

example.ex: Maureen put the nightmare behind her...
example.tran: 莫琳已将噩梦抛诸脑后。

example.ex: He will attempt to put behind him the misery of failing to win a medal in his individual event.
example.tran: 他会尽力忘掉自己没能在个人项目上夺牌的痛苦。

entry.def: If you have a particular achievement behind you, you have managed to reach this achievement, and other people consider it to be important or valuable.

example.ex: He has 20 years of loyal service to Barclays Bank behind him...
example.tran: 他已经忠心耿耿地为巴克莱银行效力了20年。

example.ex: Birgit was a popular actress with half a decade of filmmaking behind her.
example.tran: 比吉特曾是一位当红女演员，有着五年的从影经历。

entry.def: If something is behind schedule, it is not as far advanced as people had planned. If someone is behind schedule, they are not progressing as quickly at something as they had planned.

example.ex: The work is 22 weeks behind schedule...
example.tran: 这项工作比计划滞后了22周。

example.ex: We were two months behind schedule, and already over budget.
example.tran: 我们的进度晚了两个月，而且已经超出了预算。

entry.def: If you stay behind, you remain in a place after other people have gone.

example.ex: As women were not permitted in the war zone, Eleanor would have to stay behind...
example.tran: 女性是不允许进入战区的，所以埃莉诺不得不留在后方。

example.ex: About 1,200 personnel will remain behind to take care of the air base.
example.tran: 大约会有1,200人留守看管这个空军基地。

entry.def: If you leave something or someone behind, you do not take them with you when you go.

example.ex: The rebels fled into the mountains, leaving behind their weapons and supplies...
example.tran: 叛军丢下武器和给养，逃进了山里。

example.ex: He came to Saudi Arabia, leaving behind his wife and their three children.
example.tran: 他抛下妻子和三个孩子来到了沙特阿拉伯。

usage_note.note: In addition to the uses shown below, behind is also used in a few phrasal verbs, such as ‘fall behind’ and ‘lie behind’.
usage_note.translation: 除下列用法外，behind 还可用于 fall behind 和 lie behind 等短语动词中。

entry.def: Your behind is the part of your body that you sit on.

means.word_mean: 1. the fleshy part of the human body that you sit on;

sentences.sentence: "he deserves a good kick in the butt"
"are you going to sit on your fanny and do nothing?"

means.word_mean: 1. having the lower score or lagging position in a contest;

sentences.sentence: "the 8th inning found the home team trailing"

means.word_mean: 1. in or to or toward the rear;

sentences.sentence: "seen from behind, the house is more imposing than it is from the front"

means.word_mean: 2. remaining in a place or condition that has been left or departed from;

sentences.sentence: "when he died he left much unfinished work behind"
"he took off with a squeal of tires and left the other cars far behind"
"the clock is almost an hour slow"

means.word_mean: 4. in or into an inferior position;

sentences.sentence: "their business was lagging behind in the competition for customers"
"he fell behind with his mortgage payments"
"a company that has been run behindhand for years"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English  behindan, bihindan, from bi 'by' + hindan 'from behind'

sentences.cn: 我们得立刻表态支持他,否则我们就会赶不上趟了.
sentences.en: Let's jump on the bandwagon right now and endorse the man before we get left behind.

sentences.cn: 因为我相信, 我的家人 、 老师和我的朋友一定会在背后默默地支持我.
sentences.en: Because I believe, my family, teacher and my friends are standing behind and supporting me silently.

sentences.cn: 最近的民意调查显示,大多数选民支持小泉及其改革.
sentences.en: Recent polls show that voters are overwhelmingly behind Mr Koizumi and his reform agenda.

sentences.cn: 该党全体党员都支持这位新选出来的领袖, 甚至连那些曾经投票反对他的人也不例外.
sentences.en: All the members of the party have lined up behind the newly elected leader, even those who voted against him.

sentences.cn: 我赞同他,并尽我所能在背后支持他.
sentences.en: I endorse him and throw my full support behind him.

sentences.cn: 我们全力支持你们所做的这种很有意义的工作.
sentences.en: We are fully behind the fine work you are doing.

sentences.cn: 只有一部分股东支持这个新的投资计划,其他所有人都反对.
sentences.en: There are a few shareholders behind this new investment but all the rest are opposed.

sentences.cn: 永远会站你的身后, 默默支持你, 因为你我血脉紧紧相连.
sentences.en: Will always stand behind you, who support you, because you are closely connected to my blood.

sentences.cn: 他保证全力支持他的朋友.
sentences.en: He promised to swing his full weight behind his friend.

sentences.cn: 我们都支持他在竞赛中获胜.
sentences.en: We all got behind him to win the contest.

sentences.cn: 球迷在身后的支持使球队继续前进真棒!
sentences.en: It's great the supporters are behind us and that keeps the team going.

sentences.cn: 在第一次世界大战以后有一股力量在支持同盟的形成, 威尔逊痛苦地失望了.
sentences.en: A driving force behind the League's formation after World War I, Wilson had been bitterly disappointed.

sentences.cn: 该党全体党员都支持这位新选出来的领袖.
sentences.en: All the members of the party have lined up behind the newly elected leader.

sentences.cn: 谢谢你支持我.
sentences.en: Thank you for your getting behind me.

sentences.cn: 他们支持理查德,终于把他推上那个职位.
sentences.en: They got behind Richard and finally elected him to the office.

sentences.cn: 现在新的情况则丑陋不堪. 谁在背后支持他们?
sentences.en: So this is something new and ugly. What's behind it?

sentences.cn: 他的社会高层, 后生育高峰的支持者以无比的热情集结在他身后.
sentences.en: His upscale, post boomer cohort has rallied behind him with unalloyed fervor.

sentences.cn: (规划)种型和品质的支持或增强应用沿公路和背地的脸.
sentences.en: Type and quality of the support or reinforcement utilized along the roadway and behind the face.

sentences.cn: 在那时, 尽管政府长期都在蓄意影响公众舆论,但是舆论还是主要支持抗议者.
sentences.en: Then, despite the chronic disruption, public opinion was broadly behind the protesters.

sentences.cn: 队员们都支持你 吗 ?
sentences.en: Is the squad behind you?

sentences.cn: 我认为他们背后没有什么支持力量.
sentences.en: I don't think they have any buttress behind them.

sentences.cn: 整个国家都支持总统.
sentences.en: The country is behind the President.

sentences.cn: 当你难过之时, 我会在身后支持着你.
sentences.en: When you have sadness, I will stay behind and support you.

sentences.cn: 哥哥答应我在任何情况下,他都支持我.
sentences.en: My borther promised me that in every case he would stand behind me.

sentences.cn: 不管蒋介石怎样哀求也无法使国民党团结起来支持他.
sentences.en: Plead as he would, Chiang could not get the Kuomintang to and rally behind him.

sentences.cn: 我完全支持你.
sentences.en: I'm right behind you there.

sentences.cn: 尾随: 在身后紧紧跟随竞争对手, 将其当做挡风墙,以节省体力.
sentences.en: Draft: To ride closely behind a competitor, saving energy by using that racer as a windbreak.

sentences.cn: 人生的游戏转眼便结束, 人生的玩具一件件掉在身后,随即被忘却.
sentences.en: Life play is swift, life's playing fall behind one by one and are forgotten.

sentences.cn: 留在身后的是悠悠岁月,继续向前是你我真挚的友谊.
sentences.en: Left behind is the history and to move forward you my sincere friendship.

sentences.cn: 全军只得转过头来面对出现在身后的新敌人.
sentences.en: The whole army had to be turned about to face the new enemy coming form behind.

sentences.cn: 他撞开门,冲进去,枪声在身后啪啪响成一片.
sentences.en: He makes a break for the door and runs inside as gunfire rattles off behind him.

sentences.cn: 为了那些我留在身后的人.
sentences.en: For the ones I left behind.

sentences.cn: 她把她的长围巾披在身后.
sentences.en: She trained her long scarf behind her.

sentences.cn: 她的长裙拖在身后.
sentences.en: Her long shirt was trailing along behind her.

sentences.cn: 这么做, 一个人就将基于业力的关系留在身后.
sentences.en: In so doing, one leaves relationship based upon karma behind.

sentences.cn: 黄兔:“老板, 你刚才撞在身后的水缸上,水就溅到地上了嚒. ”
sentences.en: Boss, you bumped into the water vat behind and the water just spilled on the ground.

sentences.cn: 这就是为甜美和爱赋予力量,让不和谐与破坏性舞蹈留在身后的内容.
sentences.en: This is about empowering sweetness and love and leaving the discordant and destructive dance behind.

sentences.cn: 球迷在身后的支持使球队继续前进真棒!
sentences.en: It's great the supporters are behind us and that keeps the team going.

sentences.cn: 极端极性是地球此刻正在超越并将其留在身后的事物.
sentences.en: Extreme polarity is something that earth is leaving behind at this time.

sentences.cn: 汗水和智慧洒满沿途, 美丽和成就写在身后.
sentences.en: Speckled along the way sweat and wisdom, beauty and achievements was behind his back.

sentences.cn: 但愿一日醒来,我在高高的星空上,朵朵白云被远远地抛在身后.
sentences.en: I'll wish up on a star and wake up where the clouds are far behind me.

sentences.cn: 站在身后的人们一直吱吱喳喳个没完.
sentences.en: Those standing behind and chattered all the time.

sentences.cn: 当你难过之时, 我会在身后支持着你.
sentences.en: When you have sadness, I will stay behind and support you.

sentences.cn: 她双手在身后扭动可是所有的绳结那么牢固.
sentences.en: She twisted her hands behind her, but all the knots held good!

sentences.cn: 目标一直都在我们的生活中, 带着目标生活,把那些枷锁通通抛在身后吧.
sentences.en: Purpose and purpose is always. Live with true purpose and leave the limitations behind.

sentences.cn: 一只大雁的翅膀扇动空气,在身后留下一股气流.
sentences.en: A goose's wings churn the air and leave an air current behind.

sentences.cn: 黄兔:“老板, 你刚才撞在身后的水缸上,水就溅到地上了?　!
sentences.en: Boss, you bumped into the water vat behind you and the water just spilled on the ground.

sentences.cn: 我用希望驾驭我的航船, 把恐惧留在身后.
sentences.en: I steer my ship with hope, leaving fear behind.

sentences.cn: 她把一大群摄影记者甩在身后.
sentences.en: She left a swarm of photographers behind her.

sentences.cn: 她的裙子在身后拖曳.
sentences.en: Her skirt dragged behind her.

sentences.cn: 随着我们向上攀登,山谷在身后奇妙地展开.
sentences.en: As we climbed the valley behind us, It'spread out marvellously below.

sentences.cn: 但是亲爱的, 你并非孤身对战,_他在身后.
sentences.en: But dear, you are not by yourself. HE is behind.

sentences.cn: 受伤的动物在身后留下一道血迹.
sentences.en: The wounded animal left a trail of blood behind it.

sentences.cn: 她穿的那件轻薄的粉红色连衣裙在身后飘舞。
sentences.en: She was wearing a flimsy pink dress that streamed out behind her.

sentences.cn: 他双手紧扣，背在身后，在走廊里踱来踱去。
sentences.en: He paced the corridor, hands clasped behind his back.

sentences.cn: 萨姆懒洋洋地往后仰着，肘部支在身后的长椅上。

sentences.en: She finished second behind the American, Ann Cody, in the 800 metres...

sentences.en: My thinking always lags behind reality.

sentences.en: We are lagging far behind our European competitors in using new technology.
